column4: grrr! It seems that getting beryl to work with my ATi card will be more trouble than it's worth.... I kind of wanted to show it off. :(
I know. I've got an Nvidia card in my Desktop, but I just got a new laptop, and the one in my price range had an ATI card
i have beryl working fine on a mobility radeon 9700 if you have anything close to that
Ive got a Radeon Express 1100. Google gives me a lot of people with problems relating to that card.
